name: OffRoad Mountain Bike
description:
Enter the big world of extreme downhill experience! Ride your bike despite the rough terrain, high ramps, cliff edges and fog... Try to get to the checkpoints to complete the levels!

Game Features:
- 15 unique maps with different challenges
- 4 different MTB models!
- Unlock new items from Bike Store for customizing (bike chains, bike patterns, cyclist clothes, helmets!)
- Different air conditions (sunny, foggy, snowy, stormy)
- Huge free ride map
- A totally realistic and Free Bike game!
- Boost huge tricks, epic crashes, crazy downhill action!
- Off-line playable best game requires no Internet Connection!

* Keep supporting us for new levels and bikes!
